cause.description:
In Zimbabwe in southern Africa, a tyrant called Robert Mugabe is in power. The state of inflation is incredible. They are running out of food and fuel. Ordinary people are starving and dying. Please donate to help save the poor Zimbabweans from malnutrition and starvation.
1. Mugabe's government must be deposed
2. Supplies of food and fuel must be made available
3. MUgabe must face the international courts for his crimes
cause.mission: save Zimbabwe from Robert Mugabe and his tyrannical government
cause.name: Help Zimbabwe
